index.subtitle: Ruby On Rails
index.about: Ruby On Rails is an open-source web framework that's optimized for programmers happiness and sustainable productivity. It lets you write beautiful code by favoring convention over configuration.

books.title: Rails Testing Handbook
books.description: Tired of fragile code? This free hands-on book will teach you how to build better Rails apps with confidence. Learn practical behavior-driven development (BDD) from the makers of Semaphore CI/CD.
books.author: Marko Anastasov, Igor Šarčević
